biotools.summary: Visualises linked human biological data related to SARS-CoV-2 in the form of a knowledge graph, using a range of publicly available data. Includes gene, protein, gene ontology, reaction, pathway, homology, protein domain, phenotype/disease, and GWAS data and the interactions between them. KnetMiner scores and ranks genes to give the most relevant results relating to your query search.
